entry.title: $2300 // KING SIZE SUNNY BEDROOM*KITCHEN WINDOW W/ FIRE SCAPE*BACKYARD!!
entry.content:
LARGE KING SIZE SUNNY BEDROOM!

-BACKYARD / KITCHEN WINDOW / FIRE SCAPE!

-NO FEE-

NO APPLICATION FEE

This is a beautiful large apartment located in a rated and busy Bushwick/East Williamsburg spot.
Spacious king size sunny bedroom facing east, bright and sunny kitchen facing west with windows and a fire scape! large refrigerator and gas stove. Railroad! The bedroom is separated from the kitchen by a hallway and living room. Bathroom with a window and a bathtub, hardwood floors, extra closet/storage, second floor.

Backyard!
100% pest free!

Located at an awesome spot on Graham ave just few blocks from Broadway, Morgan ave & Manhattan ave. Awesome restaurants, cafes, bars and shops all over the place combined with the best artist's Bushwick vibe, convenient stores, banks, pharmacies, grocery stores within steps. Drop off laundry only 3 doors away!

AWESOME COMMUNITY

Great reliable management

Near L, M, J, G Trains

$500 Deposit to hold the place + $50 for credit check
Clean record, no previous evictions or arrest for approval

Guarantors accepted
International students and international applicants accepted
No high credit required (Not below 600)

EASY APPROVAL!

Contact soon for viewing

Catalina
show contact info

entry.title: $2500 // Cute 2 bedroom - 5th floor walk-up - exposed brick - views of Wburg!
entry.content:
This 5th floor walk-up is worth the workout with its exposed brick and PRIME location!! Close proximity to the JMZ train at Marcy Ave and surrounded by the best bars and food in all of Williamsburg. 2 equal-sized rooms with large closets and windows that can fit full-size beds comfortably. Living room is spacious enough to fit a couch and entertainment center. Counters are chef-style and can accommodate bar stools for additional seating. The building is pet friendly and there is NO BROKER FEE! $100 credit and background check for all applicants. Heat included.

PRICE IS NET EFFECTIVE WITH 1 MONTH FREE ON 13 MONTH LEASE.
